elements.title: Bristol City Leap
elements.description: City Leap is a series of energy and infrastructure investment opportunities that represent a big step towards a cleaner, greener Bristol.

elements.title: SPECIFIC / Active Building Centre
elements.description: Our building concept integrates solar technology into one system – that enables them to generate, store and release their own solar energy – both heat and electricity. Rolled out through The [Active Building Centre](https://www.activebuildingcentre.com/about-us/) seeks to revolutionise the way the UK designs, constructs and operates buildings.

elements.title: DR-BOB
elements.description: DR-BOB Demand Response energy management solution optimises the local energy production, consumption and storage in real time.

elements.title: OrbEEt
elements.description: OrbEEt framework will continuously capture and analyse real time building information from low-cost, off-the-shelf non-intrusive sensors and convert this into meaningful real-time energy rating information

elements.title: Replicate
elements.description: Replicate Renaissance of Places with Innovative Citizenship and Technology

elements.title: SmartEnCity
elements.description: SmartEnCity aim to develop strategies that can be replicated throughout Europe in order to: Reduce energy demand and Maximise renewable energy supply

elements.title: SMARTER TOGETHER
elements.description: SMARTER TOGETHER is a joint project that aims to improve citizen’s quality of life in nowadays transforming cities.
